title: Video: Hand Building the BLUEPRINT Trail in BC, a Shimano Original
content:
Mark Matthews, Chris Snodgrass, James Walter, Scott Bell, Jarrett Lindal and Arne Newman. Who are they? The guys who put back breaking work into the creation of the new BLUEPRINT Flow Trail in Cumberland, BC. With the support of Shimano, the United Riders of Cumberland and Mosaic Forest Management, Mark Mathews tells the story of [â€¦]

The post Video: Hand Building the BLUEPRINT Trail in BC, a Shimano Original appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
